original_text: And each caught his opponent by the head and thrust his sword in his opponent's side, so they fell down together. Therefore that place was called Helkath-hazzurim, which is at Gibeon.
korean_text: 각기 상대방의 머리를 잡고 칼로 상대방의 옆구리를 찌르매 일제히 쓰러진지라 그러므로 그 곳을 헬갓 핫수림이라 일컬었으며 기브온에 있더라

sentences.original_text: And each caught his opponent by the head
and thrust his sword in his opponent's side
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 대적의 옆구리에 자기 칼을 찔렀으니

sentences.original_text: Therefore that place was called Helkath-hazzurim
